name: 蘇文郁
objective: 本課程講述各種生醫材料之材料微結構、性質與製程，並對金屬、陶瓷、高分子與 複合材料之各種特性與生醫用途做一介紹。瞭解生醫材料於硬組織、軟組織與組織工程各種取代物，以協助同學瞭解各種生醫材料之性質需求與臨床上各種生物反應。作為新生醫材料研究發展上知識認識，以開發出適合人體需求之最佳生醫材料。
schedule:
W1: Introduction
W2: Fundamentals of Materials
W3: Surface characterization of materials
W4-5: Metallic Biomaterials
W6-7: Ceramic Biomaterials
W8-10: Polymeric Biomaterials
W11-12:Biomaterials for Tissue Engineering
W13-14: Tissues, the Extracellular Matrix, and Cell–Biomaterial Interactions
W15-16:Degradation of Materials in the Biological Environment 
W17:Biological Testing of Biomaterials
W18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
平時成績20%
期中成績40%
期未成績40%
materials: 1.　　B. D. Ranter, A. S. Hoffman, F. J. Schoen, “Biomaterials Science: An Introduction to Materials in Medicine“, 2nd Ed., 2004
